section.title: General Information
section.p:
Epigraphs, i. e. adages at the beginning of a book, chapter or section, are tagged with the element . The actual epigraph text is given in paragraphs (

) if it is prose text. If it is an epigraph in verses, it is framed by the element (see chap. Quotes/Epigraphs as Groups of Verses).
